section.name: Building VFS
section.p: Firstly, you will need to check the VFS source out of CVS, as described on the Source Repository page.
To build VFS, you can use either Ant or Maven.

To build using Ant, you will need Ant 1.5 or later. Use the build.xml file in the root source directory. The default target downloads the dependencies used to build VFS, and then builds the VFS jar file into the target directory.
To build using Maven, you will need to use Maven beta 7 or later. Use the jar goal to download the dependencies, and build the VFS jar. Maven builds the jar file into the target directory.

section.name: Download
section.p: Nightly builds of VFS are performed as part of the gump nightly builds. You can download the VFS jar from the latest build.
Note that sometimes the gump VFS build does not get run for some reason. If that is the case, you can download the VFS jar from one of the archived builds.
